services.title: Freelancing projects
services.description: I can help automate any product for any platform (e.g: Web, API, Android and iOS) or help you create Test automation frameworks.

services.title: Personalized Training
services.description: I can provide personalized training for any tech stack related to Test Automation and CI / CD.

services.title: Mentoring
services.description: I can help mentor you in Test Automation space, understand different concepts and tools used for Automation and CI / CD.

services.title: Knowledge sharing
services.description: I like sharing my knowledge with the QA community. I am thinking of sharing my knowledge via blogs, YouTube videos, workshops, talks, etc.
